events.name: Fertilization
events.description: Sperm penetrates egg, pronuclei fusion occurs

events.name: Maternal-Zygotic Transition
events.description: Maternal mRNAs begin degradation, zygotic genome prepares for activation

events.name: First Cleavage
events.description: Zygote divides into two blastomeres of equal size

events.name: Embryonic Genome Activation (EGA)
events.description: Major wave of zygotic gene expression begins

events.name: Second Cleavage
events.description: Two cells divide to form four blastomeres

events.name: EGA Peak Expression
events.description: Highest levels of embryonic gene expression

events.name: Third Cleavage
events.description: Four cells divide to form eight blastomeres

events.name: Compaction Initiation
events.description: Cells begin to form tight junctions and flatten

events.name: Compaction Complete
events.description: Cells fully compacted with tight junctions established

events.name: First Lineage Specification
events.description: Outer cells begin expressing TE markers (CDX2, GATA3)

events.name: Blastocoel Formation
events.description: Fluid-filled cavity forms inside the embryo

events.name: TE-ICM Segregation
events.description: Clear separation of trophectoderm and inner cell mass

events.name: Hatching Competence
events.description: Embryo becomes capable of zona pellucida escape
